Question: In Bad, this person's concept of the predatory lover can be seen on the rock song "Dirty Diana".
Hints: This person had expected the licenses to the masters of his albums to revert to him sometime in the early 2000s.
After his death, a crater on the moon was renamed Michael Joseph **** by The Lunar Republic Society in this person's honor.
This person's agents thought they had a deal several times, but encountered new bidders or new areas of debate.
